views.markdown:
Facebook video downloader inspired by Prenesi (open sourced code).

Simply hold the video you want to get and it will give you the video quality available: HD or SD

Tap it and done!

1) Updated to the be compatible with the last Facebook version
2) Cleaned the code and optimized it
3) Removed HUDs
5) Using simple alerts and status bar loading icon to display progress of video downloading process
